post.author: 이성기
post.content:
---< 2.1 Homework >------------------------------------- This assignment will be reviewed on April 7, 7:30 Evening Class
Mandatory - All assigments must be handed in with a class diagram, pseudo code and source code.
- (1) Address Book (Due date : Apr 6) When user need to find out email address, search it by person name. Also user can find telephone number by email address or person name. This address book should have addition, revision and deletion menus.
You can make this application by Java application, Servlet, JSP or Swing Neither fancy nor detail funcionality is required. Simple is the best. RDB is not required. You may implement the data storage in external file or internal hard code list.
post.title: 2.1 Homework
